location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Pasley, Acting for Brigadier General John Malcolm at the Camp at Mohumrah, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The date of the letter is 1814 but, because the enclosures are from 1808 and the letters preceding and following are in chronological order, it is likely possible that this was an error and the letter was actually written on 22 December 1808.

mods.abstract: Letter from Charles Pasley, Acting for Brigadier General John Malcolm at the Camp at Mohumrah [Mohammerah, Iran], to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, enclosing account of payments made to Jaafer Ali Khan and account of expenses and disbursements forwarded by Jaafer Ali Khan on 5 October 1808 for the purpose of reviewing them.
